channel.title: CMS/Playback APIs Release Notes
channel.description: Release notes for the CMS and Playback APIs.

item.title: Smart Playlist Enhancement - CMS API
item.description: Add search_syntax field that indicates whether a smart playlist search string uses - allows using more robust v2 search strings

item.title: Forensic Watermarking - CMS API
item.description: Add forensic_watermarking field that indicates whether a video has forensic watermarking

item.title: Sort the Videos in a Folder - CMS API
item.description: Add sort parameter to get videos in folder request

item.title: Upgrade to Search Infrastructure - CMS API
Suppress Text Track Data - CMS API
item.description: Parameter added to suppress text track data in response for a request for videos in a playlist.

item.title: Change to Media Sharing - CMS API
item.description: Add Change to media sharing when custom field matching is enforced.

item.title: Find Related Videos - Playback API
item.description: Add find related videos via the Playback API

item.title: Find Recently Deleted Videos - CMS API
item.description: Add the ability to search for videos that were deleted within the past 10 days.

item.title: Enforce Geo-Filtering Matching for Media Sharing - CMS API
item.description: Add the ability to prevent media sharing if geo-filtering is not enabled for the affiliated account.

item.title: Enforce Custom Fields Matching for Media Sharing - CMS API
item.description: Add the ability to prevent media sharing if the affiliated account does not have the same custom fields.

item.title: Media Sharing Added - CMS API
item.description: Add the ability to prevent media sharing if the affiliated account does not have the same custom fields.

item.title: Video Search Added - Playback API
item.description: Add the ability to search for videos using the Playback API.
